title: Looking for a person to play norms or ranked with.
body:
Hello.

I'm a mid/Support main looking for someone to play norms or ranked with. I got demoted to bronze V a bit ago due to a losing streak and some AFK people. (Tmw you get fed as {{champion:99}} but still can't win your team the game.) I'm not super serious about the game, I play it purely for fun. I don't have a lot of time during the week. My summoner name is Astrea, reply to this thread if you send me a request!

Have a nice day!

replies.body:
Hi Astrea!

I represent a large Discord based gaming community, I saw your post and thought you might be interested in what we offer. If you're looking for people to play with, we have plenty! 

Discord link is below, join anytime!
https://discord.gg/DwUMNDQ
Add me too, in fact i will add you and muzzle now.
